Sentencas: Systems based on planar SOFC stacks have a great potential to become compact high efficient power plants.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: At Forschungszentrum Julich system technology is under development aiming at a 20kW demonstration plant.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: An important challenge is to realize a compact and efficient system.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: To achieve this, Julich has invented an Integrated Module, which incorporates all hot parts of the system.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: After a few years of development four stacks with a nominal power of 5kW were assembled and characterized with proper quality.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: After integrating them into the system operation was started and 21.3kW gross power were achieved.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: Because of a leakage in the periphery the test had to be interrupted after 550h of operation under load.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: Because repair would have taken too long, the test was continued with two modules of 5kW power each.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System

Sentencas: The system was in operation under load for 4,000h.
Titulo: Operation Experience with a 20kW SOFC System
